mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller (seller_id, seller_pw, seller_name, seller_email, seller_phone) VALUES (#{seller_id}, #{seller_pw}, #{seller_name}, #{seller_email}, #{seller_phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE seller SET seller_email = #{seller_email}, seller_phone = #{seller_phone} WHERE seller_id = #{seller_id} AND seller_pw = #{seller_pw}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM seller WHERE seller_id = #{seller_id} AND seller_pw = #{seller_pw}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM seller WHERE seller_id = #{seller_id} AND seller_pw = #{seller_pw}
